app.name: NDS Game Emulator for Android
app.description: NDS Emulator is a great Nintendo DS emulator. It runs Nintendo DS games on your Android phone or tablet.

app.name: PocketMC : Inventory Editor
app.description: PocketMC is an inventory editor for Minecraft Pocket Edition.

app.name: Jumping Bean
app.description: Little bean running on his way and jumping over barricades toward the final victory.

app.description: Fantasy Bubble is a bubble games, Fun and addictive bubble shoot game!

app.description: Monsters Tower Defense - A classic tower defense game for any beginners or defensive specialist!

app.description: What an amazing and challenging game! Connecting train tracks let the train to pass.

app.name: Sudoku 5000+ puzzles
app.description: Pure and simple Sudoku Game. More than 5000+ sudoku puzzles. Divided into 6 level(Easy,Hard,Very Hard,Extreme,Nightmare),There are also 4 categories(Snowflake puzzles, Learning Curve, No Trick ,Superiors).
